articles.description: Alexis Ohanian replied to Ion Țiriac's comments about Serena Williams' weight. "2021 and no holding back when a racist/sexist clown with a platform comes for my family."
articles.content:
Alexis Ohanian has no time for haters who want to criticize his wife Serena Williams' tennis skills or her weight.
Ohanian, the co-founder of Reddit, had some choice words for Ion iriac, the 81-year… [+2455 chars]
